home.headline: Hello World
home.bio: I'm 37. Since 2017 I've been building justjoin.it, and since 2018 ‚Äî rocketjobs.pl. Together with a team of 100+ people, we're trying to make a positive impact on the job market in Poland. I also run the Aula Polska foundation, which has been teaching people how to build startups for 18 years.
home.bio_personal: Outside of work ‚Äî football, chess, and 20th century history.
home.disclaimer: Honestly? I don't know yet what this site will become. Maybe just a personal page, maybe a blog about what I'm learning along the way. We'll see. I'm treating it as my playground and a place to learn vibe coding ‚Äî so you'll probably find a bunch of random, unrelated things here that make absolutely no sense. That's kind of the point :)

snake.pageDescription: Classic Snake game. Use arrow keys to play.

saper.title: Minesweeper
saper.instructions: Reveal all cells that don't contain mines. Left-click to reveal a cell. The number on a cell tells you how many mines are in the surrounding 8 cells.
saper.flagInstructions: To place a flag üö© (mark a mine): right-click, or two-finger tap on a trackpad. Clicking again changes the flag to a question mark ‚ùì, and a third click removes the mark.

chess.pageDescription: Chess game with AI and two-player mode.
chess.title: Chess
chess.description: Chess ‚Äî a royal game with over 1,500 years of history ‚Äî was born in India around the 6th century AD and conquered the world as the most popular strategic game in human history.
